description:
cmd/yacc: spring cleaning for units.y

* sort imports
* use runtime.GOROOT
* fix some typos

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, dave@cheney.net (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

http://codereview.appspot.com/5987054/diff/3001/src/cmd/yacc/units.y
File src/cmd/yacc/units.y (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5987054/diff/3001/src/cmd/yacc/units.y#newcode291
src/cmd/yacc/units.y:291: file = runtime.GOROOT() + "/src/cmd/yacc/units.txt"
On 2012/04/06 11:23:22, dfc wrote:
> file = filepath.Join(runtime.GOROOT(), ...)

Done.

SGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5987054/diff/3001/src/cmd/yacc/units.y
File src/cmd/yacc/units.y (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5987054/diff/3001/src/cmd/yacc/units.y#newcode291
src/cmd/yacc/units.y:291: file = runtime.GOROOT() + "/src/cmd/yacc/units.txt"
file = filepath.Join(runtime.GOROOT(), ...)

In the past, units.y used to be broken in one way or another every time I
try it, should we add a test for it and yacc?

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=84810c98dd3d ***

cmd/yacc: spring cleaning for units.y

* sort imports
* use runtime.GOROOT
* fix some typos

R=golang-dev, dave, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5987054

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>

subject: code review 5987054: cmd/yacc: spring cleaning for units.y
